about.title: About the Library
about.description1: This library provides customizable and accessible React.js components for Next.js projects.
about.description2: Each component was developed following UI/UX best practices such as design patterns, accessibility, and responsiveness.
about.callToAction: Explore the components below to see interactive demos and usage examples.

textfield.title: TextField
textfield.description: Customizable text input component with support for labels, validation, and helper buttons.
